text: Taken is a 2008 French action thriller movie directed by Pierre Morel and produced by Luc Besson. A 17 year old American girl goes to Paris on holiday. She is kidnapped by an Albanian gang of sex traffickers. Her father rescues her. It stars Liam Neeson, Maggie Grace, Leland Orser, Jon Gries, David Warshofsky, Holly Valance, Katie Cassidy, Xander Berkeley, Olivier Rabourdin, GÃ©rard Watkins, and Famke Janssen. It was released on 27 February 2008 in France and on 30 January 2009 in the United States. A sequel, Taken 2, was released on 3 October 2012. == Other websites == * Category:2008 action movies Category:2000s action thriller movies Category:2008 crime thriller movies Category:French action movies Category:French crime movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Kidnapping in fiction Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Pierre Morel Category:Albanian- language movies
title: Taken (movie)
